scripts.dev-start: npm run stop-local-mongo && npm run start-local-mongo && node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p . && nodemon --inspect=12345 Main.js
scripts.docker-build: npm run copy-shared && docker build -t leads_care:server_$(npm get semver) . && npm run delete-shared
scripts.docker-run: docker run -d --name server-container -p 3000:3000 leads_care:server_$(npm get semver)
scripts.docker-br: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-run
scripts.docker-clean: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-rm && npm run docker-rmi
scripts.docker-tag-for-deploy: docker tag leads_care:server_$(npm get semver) $(npm get ecr_uri)/leads_care:server_latest
scripts.docker-deploy-aws: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-tag-for-deploy && npm run docker-push-aws
